string-array.name: command_descriptions
string-array.item:
"Causes the running pattern to run at a decreased frequency as a result of stretching all intervals of the pattern. This command will have no effect if one or more of the intervals are already too large (compared to a hard-coded value).

Example :
VVVVSSVVSSSS => VVVVVVSSSVVVSSSSSS 
(V : Vibration, S : Silence)"

"Causes the running pattern to run at an increased frequency as a result of shrinking all intervals of the pattern. This command will have no effect if one or more of the intervals are already too small (compared to a hard-coded value).

Example :
VVVVSSVVSSSS => VVVSVSSS 
(V : Vibration, S : Silence)"
"Causes the pattern with name {Pattern Name} to be selected."
